job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Title: DBA / Data ScientistLocation: Remote (EST)W2 only, C2C not eligibleOverview: Seeking someone with experience in: Regression modeling, Machine leaning (Text analytics nice to have), Python and / or R, and Tableau (nice to have). Ideal Qualifications:Data Science and Machine Learning Experience –Needs to manipulate data and building ModelsPython and/or R experience(someone with only SAS will not be a fit)Regression ModelingVBA developmentDatabase – Oracle(preferred)Data warehousing (Snowflake Preferred)Text Analytics Experience – NLP (Natural Language Processing)ODBCSQL server ETLTableau is nice to haveExcel is also preferred
